tvdb: Jamal apologizes to Alison for treating her badly before ending their relationship.  Casey tells Rafe how Ricky hurt her and he tells her to make the most of the time she has left.  Rafe has a surprise for Ali.  Livvie tells Jack she doesn't approve of Ali and Rafe's relationship as Rafe's leaving town soon and Ali will be hurt.  Chris visits Eve and learns of the break-in in her loft, then suspects Amy when he realizes the picture he put in Eve's purse is missing.  Ian unknowingly helps Amy shred the picture, then fears the intruder was after Amy, who bids him goodbye.  Eve and Chris confront Amy about the break-in.
